content.title: We're Fully Funded!
content.creator:
Justin McClure
February 17, 2025
content.content:
We're very grateful to all the early UltraLite backers. Thank you all so much for supporting our campaign and helping us make this a reality! 
So far we’ve reached almost $38,000 from 242 backers! This has been awesome and the good news is we still have 24 days left in our campaign! 

With your help, we can spread the word about the UltraLite and get it into as many people's hands as possible. 
Share link: https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/ultralite/the-ultralite-a-light-for-all-devices
Appreciate your support and spreading the word! Remember, the UltraLite ships in August, and when the campaign ends in March, you'll get a survey for shipping details. 

- Justin Mclure
UltraLite Founder

P.S: If you have any questions, comments, or suggestions about our campaign, please feel free to reach out to us directly at: justin@theultralite.com. We’d love to hear from you!
